text: Implicit Obedience is the debut album by the technical death metal band Desecravity. It was mixed and mastered at Mana Recording Studios by Erik Rutan (Hate Eternal) in June 2011 and was released on January 24 of 2010 on Willowtip Records. == Track listing == ==Credits== * Yuichi Kudo - Drums * Yujiro Suzuki - Vocals/Guitar * Keisuke Takagi - Guitar * Toshihiro Inagaki - Bass Category:2012 debut albums Category:Desecravity albums
title: Implicit Obedience
